alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 11 at 2:17PM MST until March 11 at 11:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...The Northern Meade County Plains, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow may significantly reduce visibility at times. Drifting snow may lead to icy roadways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
